items.sentence: You aren't suggesting I had anything to do with that, are you?
You can't appreciate the poem until you've read it many times.
I can usually easily fall asleep on a train, but not on a bus.
Tom soon realized that nobody was paying any attention to him.
I thought you might be interested in doing this with me today.
I forgot to tell you what time the meeting was going to start.
Tom was determined to not let anything like that happen again.
Tom was feeling on top of the world after getting a promotion.
The two most important people in the meeting are Tom and Mary.
Why did you say you were from Australia if you're from Boston?
